00039 CNReferenceEngine * CNReferenceEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00040 {
00041     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNReferenceEngine::EngineName())
00042         return (CNReferenceEngine *)engine;
00043     return NULL;
00044 }

00050 {

00052     m_iProbeSetCount = 0;
00053     m_iExperimentCount = 0;
00054     m_iProbeSetsToProcess = 0;
00055     m_iExperimentsToProcess = 0;
00056     defineOptions();
00057 }

00072 /**
00073  * @brief Define the options used by the log2 ratio engine.
00074  */
00075 void CNReferenceEngine::defineOptions()
00076 {
00077   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00078   defineOption("","expr-summary-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00079                      "Expression Summary Table file.",
00080                      "");
00081   defineOption("","genotype-calls-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00082                      "Genotype Calls Table file.",
00083                      "");
00084   defineOption("","genotype-confidences-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00085                      "Genotype Confidences Table file.",
00086                      "");
00087   defineOption("","genotype-report-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00088                      "Genotype Report Table file.",
00089                      "");
00090 //  defOptMult("", "genotype-chp-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Genotype CHP file.", "");
00091 //  defineOption("","chrRefId", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00092 //                     "Reference Chromosome",
00093 //                     "2");
00094   defineOption("","reference-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Copy Number Reference file.", "");
00095 
00096   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00097   defineOption("","reference-text-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00098                      "Output the reference-file in acii text format.",
00099                      "false");
00100 
00101   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00102   defineOption("", "log2-input", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Input Allele Summaries are in log2.", "false");
00103   defineOption("", "adapter-type-normalization", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00104                     "Adapter Type Normalization option. true = perform adapter type normalization.",
00105                     "true");
00106 
00107   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options");
00108   defineOption("", "set-analysis-name", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Analysis name to use as prefix for output files.", "");
00109 
00110   defineOptionSection("Execution Control Options");
00111   defineOption("", "mem-usage", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00112                      "How many MB of memory to use for this run.",
00113                      "0");
00114 
00115   defineSharedOptions();
00116 }

00122 /**
00123 * @brief Define options used by both this engine and the CNWorkflow engine
00124 */
00125 void CNReferenceEngine::defineSharedOptions()
00126 {
00127     m_pEngine->defineOptionSection("Additional CNReferenceEngine Options");
00128     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "probeset-ids", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00129                      "Tab delimited file with column 'probeset_id' specifying probesets to summarize.",
00130                      "");
00131     m_pEngine->defineOption("","annotation-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00132                     "NetAffx Annotation file.",
00133                     "");
00134     m_pEngine->defineOption("","xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00135                     "X Chromosome",
00136                     "24");
00137     m_pEngine->defineOption("","yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00138                     "Y Chromosome",
00139                     "25");
00140 }

00142 /**
00143 * @brief Define state used by both this engine and the CNWorkflow engine
00144 */
00145 void CNReferenceEngine::defineSharedStates()
00146 {
00147     if(!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("sample-count")) {
00148         m_pEngine->defineOption("","sample-count", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00149                         "sample-count",
00150                         "0");
00151         m_pEngine->defineOption("","create-reference", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00152                         "create-reference",
00153                         "false");
00154     }
00155 }

00157 /**
00158  * @brief Check to see if the options used by the copy number engine are valid.
00159  */
00160 void CNReferenceEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00161 {
00162     defineStates();
00163 
00164     setLibFileOpt("reference-file");
00165     m_pEngine->setLibFileOpt("probeset-ids");
00166     m_pEngine->setLibFileOpt("annotation-file");
00167 
00168     if (m_pEngine == this)
00169     {
00170         if (getOpt("set-analysis-name") == "") {setOpt("set-analysis-name", "CN5");}
00171         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a expr-summary-file."));}
00172         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-calls-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a genotype-calls-file."));}
00173         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-confidences-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a genotype-confidences-file."));}
00174         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-report-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a genoptype-report-file."));}
00175         if (m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a reference-file."));}
00176     }
00177     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("annotation-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a netaffx annotation-file."));}
00178 
00179     AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00180     if (m_pEngine == this)
00181     {
00182         m_pEngine->setOpt("create-reference", "true");
00183         m_pEngine->setOpt("reference-file", strReferenceFileName);
00184     }
00185 }
00186 
00187 /**
00188  * @brief Run the copy number ratio engine. The copy number ratio engine will inturn call the copy number engine.
00189  * @param CopyNumberOptions* - The options to run with.
00190  * @return int - 0 if successful else 1
00191  */
00192 void CNReferenceEngine::runImp()
00193 {
00194     try
00195     {
00196         m_data.setEngine(m_pEngine);
00197         uint64_t memAvail = ::getDouble(m_pEngine->getOpt("free-mem-at-start"));
00198         if (memAvail >= (2000 * MEGABYTE))
00199         {
00200             m_pEngine->setOpt("mem-usage", "2000");
00201         }
00202         else
00203         {
00204             int iMemUsage = (memAvail / MEGABYTE);
00205             m_pEngine->setOpt("mem-usage", ::getInt(iMemUsage));
00206         }
00207 
00208         m_data.loadAnnotation(true);
00209         m_iProbeSetCount = m_data.getProbeSets()->getCount();
00210         m_iExperimentCount = m_data.loadExperiments(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"));
00211         if (m_iExperimentCount == 0) {throw(Except("No experiments to process."));}
00212         if (m_iProbeSetCount == 0) {throw(Except("No probesets to process."));}
00213         if (!determineMemoryUsage()) {return;}
00214         if (!processData()) {return;}
00215 
00216         m_pEngine->setOpt("sample-count", ::getInt(m_iExperimentCount));
00217         if (!m_data.writeModelFile(m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file"))) {return;}
00218 
00219         if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("wave-correction-reference-method"))
00220         {
00221             if ((m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-reference-method") != "none") && (m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-reference-method") != ""))
00222             {
00223                 CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00224                 CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00225                 am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-reference-method"));
00226                 am->setEngine(m_pEngine);
00227                 am->run();
00228                 delete am;
00229             }
00230         }
00231         if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("temp-reference-file")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file") != ""))
00232         {
00233             Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"));
00234         }
00235         clear();
00236 
00237     }
00238     catch(...) {m_data.clear(); throw;}
00239 }
00240 
00241 /**
00242  * Guesstimate the maximum number of probe sets we can load for all experiments.
00243  * Guesstimate the maximum number of experiments we can load for all probe sets.
00244  * @return bool - true if successful
00245  */
00246 bool CNReferenceEngine::determineMemoryUsage()
00247 {
00248     int iMemUsage = m_pEngine->getOptInt("mem-usage");
00249     int iMBUsedForProbeSetList = (int)((77 * m_iProbeSetCount) / 1000000.0);
00250     int iMBUsedForExperimentList = (int)((58 * m_iExperimentCount) / 1000000.0);
00251 
00252     m_iProbeSetsToProcess = (int)((((iMemUsage - iMBUsedForProbeSetList - iMBUsedForExperimentList) * 1000000.0) / 9.0) / m_iExperimentCount);
00253     if (m_iProbeSetsToProcess <= 0) {throw(Except("Not enough memory to run application. ProbeSetsToProcess = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetsToProcess)));}
00254     if (m_iProbeSetsToProcess > m_iProbeSetCount) {m_iProbeSetsToProcess = m_iProbeSetCount;}
00255 
00256     m_iExperimentsToProcess = (int)((((iMemUsage - iMBUsedForProbeSetList - iMBUsedForExperimentList) * 1000000.0) / 9.0) / m_iProbeSetCount);
00257     if (m_iExperimentsToProcess <= 0) {throw(Except("Not enough memory to run application. ExperimentsToProcess = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess)));}
00258     if (m_iExperimentsToProcess > m_iExperimentCount) {m_iExperimentsToProcess = m_iExperimentCount;}
00259 
00260     return true;
00261 }
00262 
00263 /**
00264  * @brief Process the data.
00265  * @return bool - true if successful
00266  */
00267 bool CNReferenceEngine::processData()
00268 {
00269     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("temp-reference-file")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file") != ""))
00270     {
00271         bool bFailed = true;
00272         int iMB = 80;
00273         while ((bFailed) && (iMB > 0))
00274         {
00275             try
00276             {
00277             Verbose::out(3, "AAlleleEstimates Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetCount * m_iExperimentsToProcess * 4));
00278             m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00279             Verbose::out(3, "BAlleleEstimates Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetCount * m_iExperimentsToProcess * 4));
00280             m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00281             Verbose::out(3, "Genotype Calls Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetCount * m_iExperimentsToProcess * 1));
00282             m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00283             Verbose::out(3, "Done with Allocations.");
00284             bFailed = false;
00285             } catch(...) {bFailed = true;}
00286             if (bFailed)
00287             {
00288                 Verbose::out(3, "Memory allocations failed. Trying again...");
00289                 iMB -= 10;
00290                 m_iProbeSetsToProcess  =int(Min(double(m_iProbeSetsToProcess)  , ((iMB * 1000000.0) / m_iExperimentCount / 4.0)));
00291                 m_iExperimentsToProcess=int(Min(double(m_iExperimentsToProcess), ((iMB * 1000000.0) / m_iProbeSetCount   / 4.0)));
00292             }
00293         }
00294         if (iMB <= 0) {throw(Except("Memory allocations failed."));}
00295         if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"))) ) {
00296           Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file")), false);
00297         }
00298         Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"), false);
00299         affx::File5_File file5;
00300         file5.open(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"), affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00301         affx::File5_Group* pGroup5 = file5.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_RW);
00302         int iExperimentIndex = 0;
00303         while (iExperimentIndex < m_iExperimentCount)
00304         {
00305             if (!m_data.loadAlleleEstimatesByExperiment(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"), iExperimentIndex, m_iExperimentsToProcess)) {return false;}
00306 
00307             for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + m_iExperimentsToProcess), m_iExperimentCount)); iColIndex++)
00308             {
00309                 affx::File5_Tsv* pTsv5 = pGroup5->openTsv("Signals-" + ToStr(iColIndex), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00310                 pTsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "A", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00311                 pTsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "B", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00312                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_data.getProbeSets()->getCount()); iIndex++)
00313                 {
00314                     pTsv5->set_d(0, 0, m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->get(iColIndex - iExperimentIndex, iIndex));
00315                     pTsv5->set_d(0, 1, m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->get(iColIndex - iExperimentIndex, iIndex));
00316                     pTsv5->writeLevel(0);
00317                 }
00318                 pTsv5->close();
00319                 delete pTsv5;
00320             }
00321 
00322             iExperimentIndex += m_iExperimentsToProcess;
00323         }
00324         pGroup5->close();
00325         delete pGroup5;
00326         file5.close();
00327 
00328         // Free up some memory.
00329         m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->initialize(1);
00330         m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->initialize(1);
00331         m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->initialize(1);
00332     }
00333 
00334     int iProbeSetIndex = 0;
00335 
00336     // Read the gender calls from the report file.
00337     m_data.loadGenotypeReport(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-report-file"));
00338 
00339     // Calculate the median signals for each probe sets.
00340     bool bFailed = true;
00341     int iMB = 80;
00342     while ((bFailed) && (iMB > 0))
00343     {
00344         try
00345         {
00346         Verbose::out(3, "AAlleleEstimates Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetsToProcess * m_iExperimentCount * 4));
00347         m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->initialize(m_iExperimentCount, m_iProbeSetsToProcess);
00348         Verbose::out(3, "BAlleleEstimates Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetsToProcess * m_iExperimentCount * 4));
00349         m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->initialize(m_iExperimentCount, m_iProbeSetsToProcess);
00350         Verbose::out(3, "Genotype Calls Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetsToProcess * m_iExperimentCount * 1));
00351         m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->initialize(m_iExperimentCount, m_iProbeSetsToProcess);
00352         Verbose::out(3, "Done with Allocations.");
00353         bFailed = false;
00354         } catch(...) {bFailed = true;}
00355         if (bFailed)
00356         {
00357             Verbose::out(3, "Memory allocations failed. Trying again...");
00358             iMB -= 10;
00359             m_iProbeSetsToProcess  =int(Min(double(m_iProbeSetsToProcess)  , ((iMB * 1000000.0) / m_iExperimentCount / 4.0)));
00360             m_iExperimentsToProcess=int(Min(double(m_iExperimentsToProcess), ((iMB * 1000000.0) / m_iProbeSetCount   / 4.0)));
00361         }
00362     }
00363     if (iMB <= 0) {throw(Except("Memory allocations failed."));}
00364     iProbeSetIndex = 0;
00365     while (iProbeSetIndex < m_iProbeSetCount)
00366     {
00367         if (!m_data.loadAlleleEstimatesByProbeSet(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"), iProbeSetIndex, m_iProbeSetsToProcess)) {return false;}
00368         if (!m_data.loadGenotypeCallsByProbeSet(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-calls-file"), iProbeSetIndex, m_iProbeSetsToProcess)) {return false;}
00369         m_data.calculateMedianSignal(iProbeSetIndex, m_iProbeSetsToProcess);
00370         m_data.calculateXYMedianSignal(iProbeSetIndex, m_iProbeSetsToProcess);
00371         m_data.calculateMedianSignalsPerGenotype(iProbeSetIndex, m_iProbeSetsToProcess);
00372         iProbeSetIndex += m_iProbeSetsToProcess;
00373     }
00374 
00375     // Free up some memory.
00376     m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->initialize(1);
00377     m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->initialize(1);
00378     m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->initialize(1);
00379     return true;
00380 }
